mapper.insert: insert into feed SET writer_user_id = #{writerUserId}, contents = #{contents}, location = #{location}
mapper.select:
SELECT feed_id as feedId,contents,location,feed.created_at as createdAt ,if(user.nick_name IS NULL , uid,nick_name) AS writerName ,user.pic AS writerPic FROM feed INNER JOIN user ON feed.writer_user_id=user.user_id Order by feed_id desc
LIMIT #{sIdx},#{size};
